name: dao1901
description: Dao1901 is a dapp to manage a non-profit organization ruled by french law 1901

scripts.compile: cd customModules/protocol/customDeploy && python3.5 compile.py ../contracts/Owned.sol && python3.5 compile.py ../contracts/Dao1901Members.sol && python3.5 compile.py ../contracts/Dao1901Votes.sol
scripts.dev: npm run cleanCache && NETWORK=testrpc node fuse
scripts.migrateTestnet: cd customModules/protocol && NETWORK=testnet truffle migrate --network kovan
scripts.prod: npm run cleanCache && NODE_ENV=production node fuse
scripts.testProtocol: cd customModules/protocol/test && tsc && cd ../build/tests/test && NETWORK=testrpc truffle test *.js

author: Mathieu Sornay, St√©phane Roche <rstephane@protonmail.com>, Alexandre Kurth
